statements: UPDATE BiodiversityData SET population_count = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE BiodiversityData SET species_name = 'Oak Tree', ecosystem = 'Forest' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE BiodiversityData SET population_count = population_count + 100 WHERE ecosystem = 'Forest' AND species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE BiodiversityData SET ecosystem = 'Desert', population_count = 500 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE ecosystems SET location='Forest' WHERE name='Tropical Rainforest';
UPDATE species SET ecosystem_id=2 WHERE name='Tiger';
UPDATE ecosystems SET location='Rainforest' WHERE name='Amazon';
UPDATE species SET ecosystem_id=2 WHERE name='Tiger';
UPDATE species SET name='Red Fox', scientific_name='Vulpes vulpes' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE species_population SET population_count=500, last_observed='2022-09-15' WHERE species_id=1 AND ecosystem_id=2;
UPDATE species SET scientific_name = 'Canis lupus' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE species_population SET population_count = 1000, last_observed = '2022-08-15' WHERE species_id = 2 AND ecosystem_id = 3;
UPDATE Species SET gender = 'Female' WHERE species_name = 'Lion';
UPDATE Ecosystems SET location = 'Savanna' WHERE ecosystem_name = 'African Savanna';
UPDATE Species SET gender = 'Male' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE Habitats SET ecosystem_id = 2 WHERE habitat_id = 3;
UPDATE Species SET name = 'Giraffe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Observations SET date_observed = '2022-10-05' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Species SET name='Red Fox' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Observations SET date_observed='2022-03-15', ecosystem_id=2 WHERE id=3;
